item.title: Installing PyEnv
item.description: PyEnv Installing Dependencies apt-get install -y make build-essential libssl-dev \ zlib1g-dev libbz2-dev libreadline-dev libsqlite3-dev \ wget curl llvm libncurses5-dev libncursesw5-dev \ xz-utils tk-dev libffi-dev liblzma-dev python-openssl Installing PyEnv curl -L https://github.
